0.text:
I'm here at "Graham's Bush" today and I've just been
chatting with

2.text: Julie Anne Genter and Graham Cheeseman

4.text:
behind me is the bush that they want to
push a motorway through,

7.text:
and if you look you can see beautiful mature climax
forest

12.text:
that needs to be left intact to protect
habitat

15.text: and certainly not the right place to be pushing a road through

17.text:
when there are better alternatives such
as upgrading the existing road

21.text:
and improving public transport for the
area.

24.text:
join in and help and support to "Save Graham's
Bush"

27.text: Sign the petition, go to the Facebook page

30.text: and stand with this community and this bush here

33.text: let's save this beautiful piece of pristine climax ecosystem
